object.name: setMyName
object.description: Use this method to change the bot's name. Returns True on success.
object.html_description: Use this method to change the bot's name. Returns True on success.
object.rst_description: Use this method to change the bot's name. Returns :code:`True` on success.

annotations.description: New bot name; 0-64 characters. Pass an empty string to remove the dedicated name for the given language.
annotations.html_description: New bot name; 0-64 characters. Pass an empty string to remove the dedicated name for the given language.
annotations.rst_description: New bot name; 0-64 characters. Pass an empty string to remove the dedicated name for the given language.
annotations.name: name

annotations.description: A two-letter ISO 639-1 language code. If empty, the name will be shown to all users for whose language there is no dedicated name.
annotations.html_description: A two-letter ISO 639-1 language code. If empty, the name will be shown to all users for whose language there is no dedicated name.
annotations.rst_description: A two-letter ISO 639-1 language code. If empty, the name will be shown to all users for whose language there is no dedicated name.
annotations.name: language_code
